overview: Documentary film about the training of a nun, produced by Ray Stewart, first shown on Channel 11 (then WIIC) in Pittsburgh on March 19, 1960 and repeated several times. Win Fanning, TV and Radio writer for the Post-Gazette wrote ""CHANNEL 11's splendid public service program 'Why Is A Nun?' will be repeated soon. It drew an enormous mail response."" (Post-Gazette, April 4, 1960)
title: Why is a Nun?
